author: antoine.cathalau
title: Qinesis: QiGong & mindfulness Dapp
description: There is no mindfulness dapp yet, leaving a big gap for user acquisition.
solution: The next generation of meditation app : a combination of still and moving meditation with blockchain  monetization strategies.
experience: Over 20 years of experience within the wellness sector, including 10 years running a digital studio and app based products.
